document_data.name: River Lhair
document_data.mainbody: The '''River Lhair''' was a small waterway found in the far southwestern region of [[Halruaa]].
document_data.Geography: The River Lhair originated in the southern stretch of the [[Lhairghal Mountains]] near the [[Mhair Jungles]]. It flowed southeast for approximately {{SI|100|mi|long=yes}} before reaching the [[Great Sea]]. The town of [[Lhair]] was located on its eastern bank where it met the sea.
